text:
="preserve">White Aryan Resistance (WAR) is a white supremacist neo-Nazi organization in the United States. It was founded and led by former Ku Klux Klan Grand Dragon Tom Metzger. It is based in Warsaw, Indiana. Its views are seen as racist.
Their newspaper "The Insurgent" has the motto "the most racist newspaper on earth." WAR uses the slogan "White Revolution is the Only Solution".
